scripts.list: find tests -maxdepth 1 -type f -name *.html | while read f; do basename "$f" .html; done | sed 's/^test-//'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run clean && for suite in $([ "$SUITE" = "" ] && npm run -s list || echo $SUITE); do SUITE=$suite CI=true npm run tdd || exit 1; done && npm run report
scripts.docs: (cd docs && bower install) && jsduck src/ --output docs/api --warnings-exit-nonzero
